subsection.name: What is anycode ?
subsection.p: Anycode is a code generation plugin for Astah* modeling software. It exports UML models, packages, classes to text files thanks to customizable templates written in Groovy language.

subsection.name: Why an Astah* Plugin ?
subsection.p: Astah* is a user friendly UML modeling software, that enables to design domain models efficiently. Moreover, it provides a free (community) version as well as a free SDK to extend it. Finally, even if XMI format is exported by most UML softwares, it is now well known that there is no actual standard as each vendor provides its own XMI representation. As a consequence, generating code from XMI files exported from any UML tool would be a nightmare to implement.
Those are the reasons why anycode is targetted to Astah* through a plugin.

subsection.name: How it works ?
subsection.p: The main objective of this plugin is to make code generation customizable, and easy.
